tool_description: This API will get the Trending Movies
name: Trending Movie
title: Trending Movie

api_list.name: Get Trending Movies
api_list.description: This endpoint will get the lastest trending movies along with ratings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-movie1.p.rapidapi.com/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-movie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trending-movie1.p.rapidapi.com/trending"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trending-movie1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
